tasks.title: Connect with Project Lead
tasks.desc: Communicate with the team lead to clarify the SRS and work on the instructed tasks, push status updates at the end of the day

tasks.title: Water the Plants
tasks.desc: Water the plants before they dry out and spray some pesticides over the flowers and fruits
